languages.text: Сопоставив все данные, Лорд-капитан и офицеры приходят к выводу, что зеркало живет согласно циклам, примерно соответствующим по длине обороту планеты, где оно обнаружено. В первой фазе цикла зеркало поглощает любую живую материю, отразившуюся в нем. Во второй фазе цикла зеркало возвращает поглощенное, начиная с простейших организмов и постепенно двигаясь к сложным.

traits.locale_text: Сопоставив все данные, Лорд-капитан и офицеры приходят к выводу, что зеркало живет согласно циклам, примерно соответствующим по длине суткам планеты, где оно обнаружено. В первой фазе цикла зеркало поглощает любую живую материю, отразившуюся в нем. Во второй фазе цикла зеркало возвращает поглощенное, начиная с простейших организмов и постепенно двигаясь к сложным.

languages.text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.
languages.original_text: Сопоставив все данные, Лорд-капитан и офицеры приходят к выводу, что зеркало живет согласно циклам, примерно соответствующим по длине обороту планеты, где оно обнаружено. В первой фазе цикла зеркало поглощает любую живую материю, отразившуюся в нем. Во второй фазе цикла зеркало возвращает поглощенное, начиная с простейших организмов и постепенно двигаясь к сложным.

traits.locale_text: Analyzing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in accordance with the day and night cycle of its homeworld. During the first phase the mirror consumes all the organic life form it reflects. During the second it returns it back, starting with the most primitive organisms and moving on to more complex ones.

During the first phase the mirror consumes all the organic life form it reflects. During the second it returns it back, starting with the most primitive organisms and moving on to more complex ones.

During the first phase the mirror consumes absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase the organic material is returned, starting with the most primitive organisms and moving on to more complex ones.

During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

languages.text: 在分析了所有收集来的数据之后，舰长大人与军官们得出了结论——镜子的功能周期，与它所在行星的自转周期保持一致。在第一阶段时， 镜子会吸收所有被它映照到的有机生命。而到了第二阶段，镜子会重新吐出所有被它吞噬的有机物，从最简单的生物开始，随后是更加复杂的生物。
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

traits.locale_text: 在分析了所有收集来的数据之后，舰长大人与军官们得出了结论——镜子的功能周期，与它所在行星的自转周期保持一致。在第一阶段时， 镜子会吸收所有被它映照到的有机生命。而到了第二阶段，镜子会重新吐出所有被它吞噬的有机物，从最简单的生物开始，随后是更加复杂的生物。

languages.text: Tras analizar todos los datos disponibles, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y los oficiales concluyen que el espejo está en sincronía con el ciclo de rotación de su planeta de origen. Durante la primera fase, el espejo absorbe toda la vida orgánica que se refleje en él. Durante la segunda, regurgita todo lo que ha absorbido, desde los organismos más sencillos hasta los más complejos.
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

traits.locale_text: Tras analizar todos los datos disponibles, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y los oficiales concluyen que el espejo está en sincronía con el ciclo de rotación de su planeta de origen. Durante la primera fase, el espejo absorbe toda la vida orgánica que se refleje en él. Durante la segunda, regurgita todo lo que ha absorbido, desde los organismos más sencillos hasta los más complejos.

languages.text: データをすべて分析したロード・キャプテンと士官は、鏡が発見された惑星の自転周期に合わせ、鏡は機能していると結論づけた。第1段階では、鏡は映し出された有機物をすべて吸収する。第2段階では、鏡は消費した有機物を吐き戻す。最も単純な有機物から戻され、より複雑な物質を吐き出していく。
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

traits.locale_text: データをすべて分析したロード・キャプテンと士官は、鏡が発見された惑星の自転周期に合わせ、鏡は機能していると結論づけた。第1段階では、鏡は映し出された有機物をすべて吸収する。第2段階では、鏡は消費した有機物を吐き戻す。最も単純な有機物から戻され、より複雑な物質を吐き出していく。

languages.text: Nach der Analyse aller verfügbarer Daten kommen der Lord Captain und die Offiziere zu dem Schluss, dass der Spiegel mit dem Rotationszyklus des Planeten im Zusammenhang steht, auf dem er gefunden wurde. Während der ersten Phase absorbiert der Spiegel sämtliches organische Leben, das sich in ihm spiegelt. Während der zweiten Phase erbricht der Spiegel dieses organische Material wieder, angefangen mit den einfachsten Organismen, dann folgen nach und nach die komplexeren.
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Analyse aller verfügbarer Daten kommen der Lord Captain und die Offiziere zu dem Schluss, dass der Spieler mit dem Rotationszyklus des Planeten im Zusammenhang steht, auf dem er gefunden wurde. Während der ersten Phase absorbiert der Spiegel sämtliches organische Leben, das sich in ihm spiegelt. Während der zweiten Phase erbricht der Spiegel dieses organische Material wieder, angefangen mit den einfachsten Organismen, dann folgen nach und nach die komplexeren.

languages.text: Après avoir analysé toutes les données disponibles, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine et les officiers en viennent à la conclusion que le fonctionnement du miroir est lié au cycle de rotation de la planète sur laquelle il a été trouvé. Lors de la première phase, le miroir absorbe toutes les formes de vie organiques qui se reflètent dedans. Pendant la seconde phase, le miroir régurgite la matière organique consommée, en commençant par les organismes les plus simples, puis par les plus complexes.
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir analysé toutes les données disponibles, {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine et les officiers en viennent à la conclusion que le fonctionnement du miroir est lié au cycle de rotation de la planète sur laquelle il a été trouvé. Lors de la première phase, le miroir absorbe toutes les formes de vie organiques qui se reflètent dedans. Pendant la seconde phase, le miroir régurgite la matière organique consommée, en commençant par les organismes les plus simples, puis par les plus complexes.

languages.text: Eldeki tüm verileri analiz eden Lord Kaptan ve subaylar; aynanın, bulunduğu gezegenin eksen döngüsü doğrultusunda çalıştığı sonucuna varıyor. İlk aşamada ayna, camına yansıyan tüm organik yaşamı emiyor. İkinci aşamada ise en basit organizmalardan başlayıp daha karmaşık olanlara doğru ilerleyerek tükettiği organik maddeleri kusuyor.
languages.original_text: After analysing all the available data, the Lord Captain and the officers conclude that the mirror functions in line with the rotation cycle of the planet on which it was found. During the first phase, the mirror absorbs all organic life reflected in it. During the second phase, the mirror regurgitates the organic material it has consumed, starting with the simplest organisms and progressing to more complex ones.
